summary: A data container that aggregates all tensors produced by a TensorFlow sequence-to-sequence model, including the decoder’s final hidden state, optional cached key/value tensors for fast autoregressive generation, per-layer hidden states and attention matrices for both decoder and encoder, as well as the encoder’s final hidden state.
business_intent: Enable downstream applications to retrieve and reuse the full set of encoder and decoder outputs, including cached attention caches, to support efficient inference, debugging, and analysis of seq2seq models.
